## plugin-webhooks package

## Variables

|  Variable | Description |
|  --- | --- |
|  [Webhooks](./plugin-webhooks.webhooks.md) | Webhooks allow your app to be notified via HTTP when a specific event occurs on Webex. For example, your app can register a webhook to be notified when a new message is posted into a specific room.  |
